snippet: A former volunteer firefighter and his girlfriend were arrested Tuesday and are suspected of setting a majority of the 70 arsons on Virginia’s Eastern Shore over the past five months.
lead_paragraph: A former volunteer firefighter and his girlfriend were arrested Tuesday and are suspected of setting a majority of the 70 arsons on Virginia’s Eastern Shore over the past five months.

headline.main: Virginia: Couple Arrested in String of Arsons
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Couple Arrested In String of Arsons
